venue.address_1: Gowen's Corner Plaza at Route 33 and Bayside
venue.name: The KRI Center for Consciousness Studies

item.description: Have you ever wanted to learn to be a paranormal investigator? Come train with two of KRI’s investigators and learn the ins and outs, equipment setup and use, and the ethics involved in ghost hunting. Where: KRI Center for Consciousness Studies When: Saturday, July 23rd at 9pm until?... Be prepared, it could go late… This isn’t just a mock investigation. We have actual events occurring at the Center that we cannot yet explain, and it will be up to us to find some answers. To ensure everyone gets the most out of the training, we are only able to open this up to two attendees.
item.name: Paranormal Investigation Training Session!
